los_breakdown.title: System Integrity & Trust

learning_objectives.objective: Implement data governance framework compliant with GDPR/CCPA/HIPAA
Evaluate AI systems for trustworthiness and explainability

recommended_enhancements: Template: GDPR/CCPA compliance checklist for AI systems
Case study: GDPR violation penalties (British Airways, Marriott)
Exercise: Audit your organization's data governance gaps
Quiz: Regulatory compliance (15 questions)
Deliverable: Data governance policy draft (graded)

los_breakdown.title: Securing Your System

learning_objectives.objective: Design security architecture for AI/ML systems
Implement encryption and anonymization strategies for sensitive data

recommended_enhancements: Guest speaker: CISO from Fortune 500 (Jack Kufahl confirmed)
Template: AI system threat model canvas
Case study: AI security breach and remediation
Exercise: Identify 10 security risks in a sample AI pipeline
Deliverable: Security architecture proposal (graded)

los_breakdown.title: Risk Management
topics: Business continuity planning for AI systems

learning_objectives.objective: Develop comprehensive AI risk management framework
Assess AI systems for business and technical risks

recommended_enhancements: Template: AI risk register and mitigation plan
Simulation: AI incident response tabletop exercise (30 min)
Case study: AI failure and business impact (Boeing 737 MAX, Zillow)
Quiz: Risk management concepts (12 questions)
Deliverable: AI risk assessment for your organization (graded)

los_breakdown.title: Ethical AI

learning_objectives.objective: Evaluate AI systems for bias, fairness, and ethical concerns
Design responsible AI governance framework for enterprise

pedagogical_approach.format: Live lecture + Ethics case study debate

recommended_enhancements: Guest speaker: Kayte Spector-Bagdady (Bioethics expert - confirmed)
Case study: AI bias failures (Amazon recruiting, facial recognition)
Debate: 'Should we deploy this AI system?' scenario (45 min)
Template: Responsible AI checklist and governance policy
Deliverable: Ethical AI framework for your company (graded)

strengths: Covers all critical CAIO responsibilities (compliance, security, risk, ethics)
Strong mix of technical and policy content
Expert guest speakers (CISO, bioethics) add credibility
weaknesses: Heavy content load (each topic could be full course)
Limited hands-on security labs (e.g., encryption demos)
Ethical frameworks may feel abstract without real dilemmas

topics: Generative AI landscape (LLMs, diffusion models, multimodal AI)

learning_objectives.objective: Design generative AI strategy for enterprise applications
Evaluate build vs buy decisions for LLM solutions

activities: Lecture: GenAI landscape (2 hours)
Lab: Prompt engineering workshop (1.5 hours)
Case study: Enterprise LLM implementations
Group exercise: Design GenAI use case for your industry
recommended_enhancements: Hands-on lab: Build RAG system with sample data (Colab)
Comparison matrix: OpenAI vs Anthropic vs open-source LLMs
Cost calculator: LLM API costs vs self-hosting
Deliverable: GenAI strategy 1-pager for your company

learning_objectives.objective: Create persuasive AI strategy presentation for C-suite and board
Design internal influence campaign for AI adoption

activities: Lecture: Persuasive communication frameworks (1.5 hours)
Workshop: Craft your AI strategy narrative (2 hours)
Peer feedback: Practice pitches in small groups (1 hour)
Stakeholder mapping exercise (1 hour)
recommended_enhancements: Template: AI strategy pitch deck (15 slides)
Video examples: Successful CAIO board presentations
Peer review: Exchange strategy narratives for feedback
Recording: Record 3-min elevator pitch, get faculty feedback

learning_objectives.objective: Develop comprehensive digital transformation roadmap with AI as core component
Design talent and partnership strategy for AI capabilities

activities: Lecture: Digital transformation leadership (1.5 hours)
Company immersion: Visit Michigan AI research lab (2 hours)
Panel: Tech company CAIOs discuss challenges (1 hour)
Workshop: Build transformation roadmap (2 hours)
recommended_enhancements: Template: Digital transformation roadmap canvas (90-day, 1-year, 3-year)
ROI calculator: AI investment payback estimation
Vendor evaluation matrix: How to assess AI partners
Deliverable: Transformation roadmap for your organization (graded)

topics: Apply all learnings to real business problem

learning_objectives.objective: Apply comprehensive CDAIO knowledge to solve real business challenge

activities: Capstone kickoff: Requirements and rubric review (1 hour)
Individual work time: Develop capstone project (4 hours)
Faculty office hours: 1-on-1 coaching (30 min per student)
Peer consultation: Share ideas and get feedback (1 hour)

learning_objectives.objective: Deliver executive-level presentation of AI strategic initiative
Create personal leadership development plan for CAIO role

activities: Capstone presentations: 15 min each + 5 min Q&A (4-5 hours)
Panel feedback and evaluation
Leadership workshop: Personal development planning (2 hours)
Certificate ceremony and networking reception (1.5 hours)
recommended_enhancements: Video recording: Capture presentations for portfolio
Peer voting: 'Best Capstone' award
Alumni panel: Career paths after CDAIO program
Template: Personal leadership development plan (90-day goals)

strengths: On-campus experience adds credibility and engagement
Capstone with clear rubric and business impact
weaknesses: Requires 5 consecutive days off work (hard for executives)
Travel costs and time commitment may be barrier
Capstone project development compressed into 1.5 days

pillars_3_4_synthesis.bloom_quality_score: 10/10 - 90% at Create level, perfect for executive education

pedagogical_evaluation.score: Perfect - All 5 andragogy principles deeply embedded

learning_methods.case_studies: Ethics debates, security breaches, compliance failures
learning_methods.capstone: Major deliverable with real business problem

pedagogical_evaluation.methods_score: 10/10 - Comprehensive mix of all effective executive ed methods

assessment_analysis.rigor_score: 9/10 - Strong capstone focus, but missing incremental quizzes
recommendations: Create detailed rubrics for Pillar 3 deliverables
Add peer evaluation component (20%) for capstone
Require capstone draft review midway through Day 4

gaps_identified.improvement: Start capstone earlier (assign after LOS 8), provide templates
gaps_identified.justification: Executives need time to develop high-quality strategic deliverables

gaps_identified.gap: No MLOps or AI in production content
gaps_identified.improvement: Add Day 1 session on MLOps, monitoring, model drift, A/B testing
gaps_identified.justification: CAIOs need to understand operational AI, not just strategy

gaps_identified.gap: Limited technical depth on GenAI implementation
gaps_identified.improvement: Extend Day 1 with hands-on RAG implementation lab (2 hours)
gaps_identified.justification: CAIOs should be able to prototype GenAI solutions

gaps_identified.improvement: Offer quarterly alumni meetups, Slack community, office hours
gaps_identified.justification: Learning continues after program - need ongoing support

program_strengths: Comprehensive CAIO skill coverage (technical, strategic, leadership)
Executive-focused pedagogy (case studies, simulations, peer learning)
Clear learning objectives aligned to CAIO job requirements
program_weaknesses: Compressed GenAI coverage (could be full module)
No MLOps or production AI content
No ongoing post-program support or community
